Description:
Ready Made Investment
Come and inspect this modern, three year old, two bedroom brick unit. Walking distance to Holy Rosary School, Botanical Gardens and 5km drive to Bendigo CBD and 3km to Epsom Village, provides convenient town living. It includes a light and airy open plan living space, two good size bedrooms, with WIR to master and two way bathroom, low maintenance courtyard, split system and single garage with direct internal access. An excellent investment currently let at $280 per week till May 2017

Description:
CHIC CREAM BRICK - CORNER BLOCK
Well hello buyers! Come step inside this absolute classic cream brick, and you will not be disappointed.
- Freshly painted with wide hallway entrance highlighting 9 ft ceilings and striking polished floorboards
- Three large bedrooms each containing substantial storage. Ducted evaporative cooling & gas heating for year round comfort.
- The large lounge is light filled, with plenty of space for relaxation.
- The open plan meals zone is off the kitchen with access to the large timber deck at the rear of the property, with rendered rear wall it a tasteful element to create this rear entertaining zone.
- Well-appointed kitchen with Caesar stone benchtops, modern cabinetry & stainless steel appliances & pantry.
- Stylish renovated bathroom with modern tiles, built in storage behind the mirror.
- Large renovated laundry with storage.
- Timber alfresco at the rear, perfect for summer BBQ's.
- 641 sq.m allotment, corner block off Napier Street & Grace Street, which is a lovely wide no through road.
- Complete side gate access through to the large shed (6m X 12m).
Immaculately presented, with attractive modern conveniences - it will not last long!
Bec Allen : 0438 528 091
Insights: 443 Napier Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2017 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
DEVELOPERS AND RENOVATORS TAKE NOTE!
Located in a very good part of Bendigo is this quaint home on an 560m2 allotment - offering scope to Invest or develop as a home or demolish and re-develop as a land parcel (STCA). Position is excellent being only a few metres from the popular Bendigo Creek walking track, Weeroona College and Lake Weeroona - a solid opportunity to gain capital growth in the coming years.
The home boasts two bedrooms and a smaller third bedroom or study positioned at the front of the home; the lounge is spacious and located in the centre if the home, it boasts a reverse-cycle split system air conditioner and gas heater â?? and is the main living hub. Adjacent is the kitchen where there is room for a small meals table; it boasts basic cabinetry and a 600mm upright cooker. The bathroom has been updated with toilet, small hand basin and a walk-in shower.
Keep for a while - rent-out whilst you plan, renovate or develop (STCA) - the choice is yours, in this location it is smart money - for the expected price on offer!!
Insights: 14 Waratah Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018 and 9 other 2 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
First-Rate White Hills Corner
1940's solid brick home makes a positive first impression with its' leafy garden surrounds, classic wrought-iron trimmed front patio and imposing Old English-style front door.
Charm and character continue inside the warm, inviting home where high ceilings with detailed cornice and ducted heating/cooling flows throughout.
Accommodation includes three bedrooms and combined lounge/dining room featuring a brick fireplace flanked by niche wall shelves and French doors opening to a private north-facing courtyard fringed with ferns and a wisteria-covered arbour.
Original kitchen includes electric cooking, curved island bench and dining nook with built-in table and bench seating while remodelled bathroom has a relaxing spa bath, separate shower, wc and vanity. Versatile third bedroom includes gas-heated sitting area/parent's retreat, built-in robes and external access to a rear patio.
The corner allotment approximately 806 square metres provides access to a three-car garage/workshop accessed off Plumridge Street and the possibility of future subdivision.
First-rate position very close to schools, shops, public transport, Bendigo Creek Linear park walking trail to Rosalind Park and the popular White Hills Botanical Gardens.
Occupy, renovate, invest, expand or develop â?? every which way, this property has the promise of pure potential.
Insights: 39 Raglan Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2017 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
WALK TO THE LAKE
Perfectly positioned in the popular 'Peppercorn Estate', this established home with large open plan living, kitchen and dining area sits on family sized 687 sqm allotment.
With walking tracks to Lake Weerona and minutes to the centre of Bendigo this property offers city living in a country atmosphere.
Features include:
-Main bedroom with ensuite and WIR
-Bedrooms 2 , 3 and 4 all with BIR's
-Tiled Kitchen with island bench, walk in pantry and 900mm stove
-Undercover entertaining area
-Ducted heating and cooling
-Double garage with internal entry
So if you are looking for a modern home with lots of outdoor space that's close to town look no further.
Directions: Turn off Holdsworth Rd into The Boulevard then right into Topaz Ave.
Matt Leonard : 0418 502 633
Insights: 15 Topaz Avenue, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2017 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
First Home Owners & Investors - TAKE NOTE!
The ideal property to make your first home or add to your investment portfolio. Currently leased until January 16th, 2017 with a powerful return of $310p.w. This 4 bedroom home is low maintenance and has had modern updates made to surprise you on entry. Fresh paintwork and carpets. Renovated bathroom, extra powder room and laundry. A fantastically large family room at the rear provides a spacious feeling to the property and separates itself from the bedroom areas. A compact low maintenance yard, single carport, garden shed, ducted heating & airconditioning & security doors front and rear are just extra additions to a great package.

Description:
PRICE + POSITION = VALUE
Located in a lovely quiet court this 3 bedroom weatherboard home with tiled roof would be perfect for first home buyers or ideal for an investor who is interested in adding to their property portfolio.
This fantastic home features 3 bedrooms, main with BIR, a spacious and practical kitchen and dining area, newly updated modern bathroom and large living room with gas heating and ceiling fan for year round comfort.
Outside a generous sized low maintenance backyard with a 3.5m x 7m garage with concrete flooring and power. Within walking distance to the White Hills Botanical Gardens, schools, shops and a short distance from the CBD this home offers position and value for those in the market to purchase.
Please note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
COMFORTABLE & CONVENIENT HOME !!
Only about 4kms, 5-7 minutes' drive, from the CBD and the expanded Epsom Shopping Center, this well maintained home is sited in a quiet avenue on a manageable block of approximately 490m2. The kids can walk to either Primary or Secondary schools, there's a bus stop around the corner and a shopping strip a few minutes away. This low maintenance 3 bedroom family home has all the comforts and space for easy living. It has gas appliances, ducted heating & air conditioning, built in robes in 2 bedrooms, ceiling fans throughout, separate lounge, polished floor boards, covered Al fresco area, carport and single garage or workshop. It's ideal for first home buyers or alternatively, an ideal investment property. Expected rental of $260 to $280 per week.

Description:
8 Baden Street, White Hills
This 3br home on a 700m2 block is in a fantastic location.
Good size yard for the kids to play, Close to schools, the new hospital, a short stroll to Lake Weeroona,
and only minutes from the Bendigo town centre.
The property has two street access, and has a huge shed that will cater to most needs.
What a great chance to buy into the market in a high sought after area, and close to Bendigo. Or subdivide STCA.

Description:
MOST IMPRESSIVE - WHITE HILLS
Positioned only a short drive to Lake Weeroona, Bendigo CBD and the new hospital precinct is this immaculately presented residence in White Hills.
The property features:
- Two very spacious bedrooms, both with ample built in robe storage.
- High ceilings of 9ft/2.7mt (approximately).
- Central bathroom with corner shower and large bath (both with hand rail guides) plus large vanity unit & mirror.
- A separate toilet with a hand rail guide.
- An updated reverse cycle split system heating & cooling unit.
- Spacious front lounge.
- Quality kitchen with gas cooktop, electric oven, ample cupboard and bench space plus a separate pantry.
- A large dining area adjoins the kitchen.
- Step outside to discover concrete paths, low maintenance feature pebbled area, edged garden beds with established plant life.
- Attached single garage approximately 6m x 3.6m with concrete floor, automatic roller door and direct/secure access to the rear yard & house.
Other features to mention:
- Extra power points & TV points throughout.
- External window awnings.
- Very secure yard with colorbond fencing and side gate access.
This property is impressive, inspection will not disappoint, enquire today!

Description:
Exclusive and extraordinary
Constructed in 2012 by Russell Parsons, renowned for custom homes of supreme quality, this residence displays the WOW factor that befits its creator. Premium privacy is provided by a unique facade and an elevated position takes full advantage of lofty vistas over the surrounding area.
Immense room dimensions share an extravagance of space between open plan living, study and 3 bedrooms. The master bedroom contains an equally generous ensuite and walk-through robe hidden behind the bedhead wall. Victorian ash floors flow from front solid timber door to rear glass slider, past a wall of glass inviting a deluge of daylight indoors.
Topped with polished concrete, the island breakfast bar makes a robust statement in a superbly appointed kitchen. Greater ceiling height designates the living and dining area and similar zones are mirrored alfresco. Draped in the lush foliage of a grape vine, a pergola permits winter sunlight to penetrate inside but will elegantly deny summer sunshine. Alongside, a roof with ceiling fan shelters second outdoor entertaining space.
Concealing entry, an exterior feature wall disguises access to a double garage that also has direct internal access to the residence. In close proximity to Botanical Gardens, primary schools, local football ground, shopping centre plus public transport, a nearby walking track leads to most attractions and necessities.
Architecturally designed and situated in a well-respected area, this striking residence has the ability to leave an indelible impression. Astute purchasers seeking a stunning alternative to the average property would be wise to inspect before it's snapped up by others craving something truly special.
Matt Gretgrix : 0438 911 688

Description:
Quality family home on huge allotment
The home sits proudly on a huge 1062m2 allotment and features stunning street appeal, established gardens, fabulous undercover outdoor living area, double carport, good shedding and is located in a sought after area close to all amenities offering a relaxed lifestyle.
Inside the home features:
*Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite
*Good size second and third bedrooms with built in robes
*Option for a 4th bedroom
*Large kitchen that overlooks the meals area
*Separate living area
* Ducted gas heating, ceiling fans and ducted cooling
Outside features include:
*Large block
*Fully fenced to keep the kids and pets safe
*Stunning street appeal
*Beautiful low maintenance established gardens
*Veranda's to three side of the home
*Huge undercover outdoor living area
*Man cave (or the option of another bedroom)
*Double carport
*Garage/workshop & garden shed
*Room for the boat, caravan and trailer
*Plenty of off street parking
Easy walking distance to the stunning Botanical Gardens, White hills recreation reserve, White hills swimming pool, public transport, hotels, cafes, takeaway food outlets, white Hills shopping precinct, schools and a short drive to Bendigo CBD.

Description:
Perfectly Presented 4 Bedroom Home
Situated in ever-popular Peppercorns Estate you will find this 4 bedroom home with all the upgrades you would expect of a quality property. From the moment you enter over the merbau entrance deck you are greeted with high ceilings and wide entrance hall giving a light filled spacious feel. All bedrooms have built in robes with a large walk in robe to the master, as well as an ensuite with his and her basins, oversize shower and toilet in its own room. The kitchen continues with the upgrades with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances adjacent the dining /family room ideal for the whole family. There is also a separate lounge creating 2 living zones for the family. Climate is controlled with central heating and evaporative cooling and split system in the master for those really hot nights. The alfresco that leads from double sliding doors from the family room is perfect for entertaining with large deck, feature wall and built in BBQ area. With a 3 car garage and through access to the yard perfect for the trailer or boat with a perfectly presented yard with the bonus of recycled water to keep it green. All this close to Bendigo Creek walking paths, Lake Weeroona and Weeroona College. Don't hesitate to inspect call today.

This kitchen has it all including stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and two door pantry. The beautiful main tiled bathroom offers a bath with separate shower. Extras include: ducted gas heating. A double lock up garage with remote also has internal access to the home. The location is ideal. Conveniently located near the Botanical Gardens, Schools and public transport. Perfect for downsizing, just starting out or an investment property. Don't delay inspection is a must.

This home has a lot to offer the first home buyer or investor. This well presented WB home is located in popular White Hills. Spacious lounge room and separate kitchen-dining area with electric stove and dishwasher. Features include ducted heating and cooling, tandem carport, garden shed and enclosed yard. All located in a quiet area within close proximity to all amenities and a walking track.

Description:
QUIET COURT POSITION
Great Value for money here in this Tiled roof home in a lovely family neighborhood. Three nice bedrooms one with BIRs. Very generous lounge with gas fire for those chilly winter nights.
Separate kitchen with room for dining table and good bench space and gas stove. Bathroom has a bath, vanity and separate tiled shower. Laundry leads to back vestibule handy for the kids boots. Outside a very nice rear garden and fully fenced for the kids or dogs to be safe in .
Single garage with enough room for workshop also, this has concrete floor.
This home would be an excellent buy if your kids are at Uni and you require a home for them for the next three years, or maybe add to your rental portfolio.
If you require to take up residence I can personally recommend the area as I once lived there. Walk down to the Bendigo Creek walking track, short bike ride for the kids to Weeroona College. Bus on highway to come into town
Forget paying the rent......
Helen Ashby : 0408 42 5566

Description:
Rennvators Delight
If you have the vision, then look no further than this Great opportunity to own this character 3x1 home set on a generous 474sqm block, with a new roof and stumps the major task are already completed.
The property has open plan kitchen/dining/living area, a large shed, located close to schools, Lake Weeroona, bike tracks and pubs and also within walking distance to the heart of Bendigo, property offers so much potential, would suit someone looking for a renovators delight.
Property Features Offers;
Wall Mounted Air Condition Unit into Lounge
Large Shed

Description:
Charming Modesty
The ever enduring lure of a white picket fence and iron-laced verandah remain to entice at this handy address. Stained glass windows and an open fireplace continue their charming presence, where 11' timber ceilings soar above Baltic pine floors. Gas heating and ducted cooling, plus a 900mm stainless steel cooker bring comfort and a little luxury indoors. The bathroom services 3 good-sized bedrooms and there's a multi-purpose room that could be a study or cosy second living area.
Simple yet sufficient to lend a rosy outlook, the sunny side garden has flexible prospects, whether screened to create a private retreat or utilised for extra off-street parking. Add a few pot plants and a splash of paving paint to the rear verandah, where a blank canvas inspires your preferred style of outdoor living.
A primary school sits just around the corner and it's only a 4 minute cycle to secondary college.
A nearby creek-side track also delivers a safe route into the CBD via Lake Weeroona in one direction, and Botanic Gardens park and pool in the other.
A short walk to shops and the bus stop into Bendigo adds even more convenience to this location.
Recent tenants who were paying $230 per week, have moved out allowing vacant possession.
Aluminium cladding, powder-coated front fence, new Colorbond fencing and on a compact allotment means minimal maintenance is required, ideal for busy people or investors.
Modest yet highly appealing, this property continues to possesses endearing allure.
Paul Byrne : 0439 441 198
